Description_lang: During Berserk, $?a137010[Mangle][Shred], $?s202028[Brutal Slash][Swipe], and Thrash have a $h% chance to make your next $?a137010[Maul][Ferocious Bite] become Ravage.

description_blz.en_US: During Berserk, Shred, Swipe, and Thrash have a 25% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.
description_blz.es_MX: Durante Rabia, Triturar, Flagelo y Vapulear tienen un 25% de probabilidad de hacer que tu siguiente Mordedura feroz se convierta en un Devastar.
description_blz.pt_BR: Durante Berserk, Despedaçar, Patada e Surra têm 25% de chance de transformar sua próxima Mordida Feroz em Assolar.
description_blz.de_DE: Während der Effekt 'Berserker' aktiv ist, haben 'Schreddern', 'Prankenhieb' und 'Hauen' eine Chance von 25%, Euren nächsten Einsatz von 'Wilder Biss' zu 'Verheeren' zu machen.
description_blz.en_GB: During Berserk, Shred, Swipe, and Thrash have a 25% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite become Ravage.
description_blz.es_ES: Durante Rabia, Triturar, Flagelo y Vapulear tienen un 25% de probabilidades de convertir tu siguiente Mordedura feroz en Devastar.
description_blz.fr_FR: Pendant Berserk, Lambeau, Balayage et Rosser ont 25 % de chances de transformer votre prochaine utilisation de Morsure féroce en Ravage.
description_blz.it_IT: Durante Berserk, Artigliata, Spazzata e Falciata hanno una probabilità del 25% di trasformare il successivo lancio di Morso Feroce in Devastazione.
description_blz.ru_RU: Во время действия "Берсерка" способность "Полоснуть", "Размах" и "Взбучка" с вероятностью 25% превращают следующий "Свирепый укус" в способность "Терзание".
description_blz.ko_KR: 광폭화의 지속시간 동안 칼날 발톱, 휘둘러치기, 난타가 25%의 확률로 다음 흉포한 이빨을 찢어발기기로 전환시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在狂暴期間，撕碎、揮擊和痛擊有25%的機率使你下一個兇猛撕咬變成劫掠。
description_blz.zh_CN: 狂暴期间，撕碎、横扫和痛击有25%几率使你的下一次凶猛撕咬变为毁灭。
